name: Orange
description: Bright, juicy, and full of vitamin C — a zesty burst of freshness in every peel.

name: Lime
description: Small but bold — a tangy twist that livens up any flavor.

name: Lemon
description: Zingy and refreshing — perfect for drinks, dressings, and detoxing your day.

name: Tangerine
description: Easy to peel and naturally sweet — the perfect snack-sized citrus.

name: Calamansi
description: Tiny, tart, and packed with punch — a Filipino favorite for zest and zing.

name: Pomelo
description: Sweet, mild, and juicy — a giant citrus with gentle flavor.

name: Grapefruit
description: Bittersweet and juicy — a bold citrus that's refreshing and energizing.

name: Mandarin
description: Soft, sweet, and kid-friendly — citrus made simple and delicious.

name: Mango
description: Golden, juicy, and irresistibly sweet — the true taste of the tropics.

name: Pineapple
description: Tropical, tangy, and refreshingly sweet — a juicy bite of sunshine in every slice.

name: Banana
description: Soft, creamy, and naturally energizing — the perfect go-anywhere snack.

name: Papaya
description: Smooth and mellow with a tropical twist — perfect for digestion and delight.

name: Coconut
description: Hydrating and versatile — from refreshing water to creamy meat.

name: Dragon Fruit
description: Vibrant, mildly sweet, and rich in nutrients — exotic beauty in every bite.

name: Guava
description: Fragrant, fruity, and full of fiber — sweet tropical goodness from the inside out.

name: Jackfruit
description: Sweet, fibrous, and filling — nature’s meat substitute with a fruity twist.

name: Water Melon
description: Cool, crisp, and hydrating — summer’s favorite fruit in every bite.

name: Cantaloupe
description: Fragrant and orange-fleshed — juicy sweetness with every spoonful.

name: Honeydew
description: Light green and ultra-refreshing — a mellow melon for any moment.

name: Winter Melon
description: Mild and cooling — often used in soups and teas for a refreshing twist.

name: Korean Melon
description: Crunchy, sweet, and small — a unique melon with a floral hint.

name: Galia Melon
description: Honey-sweet and musky — a flavorful blend of cantaloupe and honeydew.

name: Canary Melon
description: Bright yellow outside, smooth and sweet inside — tropical sunshine in a slice.

name: Santa Claus Melon
description: Mild, sweet, and long-lasting — the holiday melon for year-round joy.

name: Strawberries
description: Lusciously red and naturally sweet — perfect for desserts, smoothies, or fresh indulgence.

name: Blueberries
description: Tiny, mighty, and packed with sweetness — a superfruit for any time of day.

name: Raspberries
description: Delicately sweet with a hint of tart — nature’s perfect pop of flavor and color.

name: Blackberries
description: Bold, juicy, and rich in antioxidants — perfect for snacking or baking.

name: Cranberries
description: Mild, sweet, and long-lasting — the holiday melon for year-round joy.

name: Gooseberries
description: Tangy and unique — a punchy little berry packed with flavor.

name: Mulberries
description: Sweet and soft — a juicy treat often found in jams and pies.

name: Acai Berries
description: Earthy, nutrient-rich, and smoothie-ready — a trendy superfood with ancient roots.
